eu.ehri.project.persistence

Class ActionManager.EventContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.ehri.project.persistence.ActionManager.EventContext
  • Enclosing class:
    ActionManager

    public class ActionManager.EventContext
extends Object
    EventContext is a handle to a particular action to which additional subjects can be added.

      • createVersion

        public ActionManager.EventContext createVersion(Entity frame,
                                                Bundle bundle)
        Create a snapshot of the given node using the provided data. This is useful when the node has already been changed at this point the snapshot is taken.
        Parameters:
        frame - The subject node
        bundle - A bundle of the node's data
        Returns:
        This event context
